text: Ezɨ Jonadap a ikaragha ghaze, “Nɨ ifar arei moghɨn damu, egh uan mɨsiamɨn irɨghɨv ikɨ mamaghɨra ikɨ. Eghtɨ nɨn afeziam nɨn gansɨ aven izɨtɨ, nɨ kamaghɨn a mɨkɨm suam, ‘Ga uaning! Nɨ nan buaramizim Tamar amadaghtɨ an aven izɨ, eghtɨ kɨ gantɨ, a na bagh daghetam tuam. Egh a uabɨ daghem na danɨngtɨ kɨ aneremam.’ ”
